metadata.name: THE LAST SUPPER
metadata.description:
- Jesus was waiting for his friends in a gallery - A painting by the great Italian artist Leonardo da Vinci was to be displayed - They were supposed to see the painting first and then have dinner together - It was the last dinner they had together - Jesus was to be Go on a long journey - his friends came. The painting was unveiled.
Oh my God, this is a wonderful painting, James said.
What pure and beautiful images, Matthew said.
What a strange composition, said Simon.
Judas said it must be very expensive - maybe 30 silver coins!
The knife in the man's hand is like mine," Peter said.
The most interesting friends they are the 13, just like us," Jesus said.
I think there's a big secret in this painting - but I don't know what, Philip said.
The painting does not even have a name, Andre said. What do you think we should call it?
Everyone went and sat around the table to have dinner -
Jesus said, Let us call it the Last Supper, just like our own Supper.

Technique :Collage
